document_data.mainbody:
holber Greene was a guest of Nortales Hostel in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Dholber was a dark-skinned human man with hazelnut eyes and trimmed gray beard. As a refugee, he was dressed in simple commoners garb.
In the , as the Absolute crisis ravaged the Western Heartlands, the city of Baldurs Gate became flooded with refugees. Dholber Greene was lucky enough to secure lodgings for himself and his daughter, Dwindling Greene, at Nortales Hostel that offered beds to the refugees. Dholber was tired and devastated by the loss of other members of the family, who did not make it to the Gate.
